I think this runs a little small. I usually order an XL if I’m wearing anything underneath a jacket or sweater. This jacket fits snug with the sleeves a little bit short. 评论概述: nice top BUT THEY REPEATEDLY SEND THE WRONG SIZE
评论详情: I ordered a M in gray and navy. The sleeves were too short, so I returned for L in both colors. The gray arrived in L. It fits great. The navy arrived in a S. I returned it for a L. It again arrived in a S. They again were to send a L; again a S. The Amazon Chat person suggested the seller might not have the L, so I ordered a light blue. We'll find out today if that arrives in the correct size. Otherwise I like this style; comfortable, etc. I wanted roomier than a medium & the sleeves were definitely too short (my normal size) in case it shrinks in the wash (I plan on cold wash/low heat dry).
Very good, soft,  cotton, warm !

I am 5'5" and 140 pounds.  I usually wear a size medium, and this medium fit great.  I liked the look on me.  I do not like hoodies, which is why I ordered this sweatshirt, but I do not like the collar.  it fits too tight around the neck (and I have a skinny neck). wanted a change from the usual hoodie.  nice quality.  soft and comfy.  maybe a little boxy on me but perhaps i should have bought a size down.  size is as expected.

After using this jacket in the cold weather, 30 to 40 degrees, I can write they are incredibly warm for a sweat jacket. Which  is sort of the problem because I intended  to use it indoors. They wash well and are roomy.

I debated on which color to select for a while. Despite not being one of my favorite colors, I decided on brown to mix it up a bit and because I think this would be a good transition color into the fall season. The customer pictures are accurate and helped with my decision since the brown color is not as deep as it is in the advertised product pictures.  This is a good solid weight, and it seems like it will be a nice throw on and go sweater. It fits true to size. If you want a looser fit or plan to wear a bulkier top or sweater underneath, go up a size. I got this on a sale deal. I would consider another color if there's another deal.

评论概述: Does not follow the size chart!
评论详情: Buyer beware. The jacket itself is fine. The color is very nice and it feels as though it would be warm. However, it is important to know that the jacket is smaller than the size chart would indicate. The large is supposed to be 47.5 inches at the bust, and it is barely 44 inches. Unfortunately, I bought this for a gift and by the time I realized the problem I had missed the deadline to exchange it, so that's on me. It would be nice, though, if I could exchange, since I don't really want a "return," per se.

The jacket is really flattering on me. I love that it's made of 100% cotton. That's one of the reasons I bought it. I'm 5'5 and weight is 158 lbs. The jacket is simple but has a very classic look. It's the first time I get something this color but like I said it looks really nice on me. The fit is perfect. I got an L. I will be washing it in cold water and low heat dry or maybe even air dry so it doesn't shrink because it fits just right. I'd recommend it for sure. I'm so tempted to get it in another color. Great buy. I thought I was going to be returning it but nope. It's not too thick or too thin and it's just warm enough for me who lives in Southern CA.

I was needing to replace a much loved and used jacket, perfect for wearing indoors in winter. The style of this jacket was very similar and looked to be about the same weight fabric wise. I held my breath while trying it on, and found to my amazement that it was absolutely perfect. My old jacket was from a different manufacturer and purchased over 20 years ago. Even so, this jacket could be its twin, except for being a different color! I am so happy with my purchase and highly recommend it.  I will add that it is really not a warm enough jacket for very cold outdoor winter weather (think mountains of snow and blowing winds)  but great for cooler days in a warmer clime - or as in my case, something for a cooler house temperature but still good for dashing momentarily outside in the freezing cold, if needed.

UPDATE: Still like the jacket, but the sleeves did shrink up. I would either lay flat to dry or size up. Color stayed and so did length to waist.  I ordered the black zip up bomber look jacket in a large. I am 5'5"/160lbs. I like that it has pockets, sits a bit below the waist on me with a thick elastic type banding. Looser fit at this size, soft and comfy. I normally order mediums but because it's all cotton, I expect a bit of shrinkage, so either way it should be a great throw on hoodie without the hood. Cons: bright silver zipper. I would have preferred black, but at least this one has a black placket unlike others I've seen that are white. Looks nice, dressed up or down. I can see grabbing this daily and will probably order additional colors. Note I have not washed it yet but am hopeful it washes well without pilling. Decent price.
I like it. Good quality

I love my zipper sweatshirt.  It is the perfect thickness, not super heavy, yet not thin either. I like the side pockets, they aren't real deep, but deep enough. I only wish they had more colors. I will be buying at least 1-2 more.

Just opened this and I must say I was a little hesitant because the picture of the pink color looked drab, but not at all, very pretty pink, I got the 2xx, I'm 5'5", 185 and this fits perfect...all my weight is in the middle so this is perfect. 评论概述: Upon closer inspection, it is cheaply made and unfinished
评论详情: I really liked the no hood, soft interior and smooth zipper when I received these.  I ordered black and Khaki colors.  I just pulled the black out of the washer and realized that the inner front facings under the zippers are not sewn down; it also faded and shrunk a bit.  I can live with slight fade and shrinkage, but I absolutely HATE when manufacturers cut corners on sewing the facing down of a button or zipper panel fabric strip.  It causes the inner facing to crinkle up and look extremely cheap after a wash or two.  To resolve this I have to sew extra seams down the front of the garment to properly tack the facing down.  Anyhow I consider open facings as unfinished garments that have to be repaired to be worth keeping.

评论概述: Metal zipper. Soft fabric. Comfortable collar
评论详情: Metal zipper. They hold up better. Fabric in super soft. Medium weight. Color is as depicted. Size is true to fit.

Choosing a size was difficult based on incorrect sizes shown on size guide and customer reviews, so just stuck to what I usually wear, and it fit perfectly. VERY happy with this jacket, plan to buy more colors.

I’m hoping that if I wash it and hang it to dry, it’ll stretch back out in length. Otherwise I really like it — it’s cute. Probably should be priced about $29 rather than $39.

Buy a couple sizes up if you're someone who tosses all their clothes in the dryer without bothering to read the wash instructions on the tags. It fit perfectly before I washed it. Then it tragically shrank. It's still cute though, just not as roomy and the sleeves aren't quite as long any more.
I love this jacket so much, I’m thinking about getting another color. It is a beautiful cut and fits great for me, I’m 5’3, 175 lbs and got a size Xl.
Like color fits good

Absolutely loved this jacket. Ordered the brown. It is more of a dark tan (think autumn color) than brown. It is soft (although not fuzzy inside) and feels nice on my skin. I even washed it, minimal shrinkage and fabric felt great after wash and dry (note that the pics were pre-wash). Arms fit nice and are not tight, which is a problem I often have. Would totally recommend and may buy another color.

The fabric is soft but fairly thin.4/3/2024 Update - I have a feeling this is made for men.  It zips on the wrong side of the opening.  It also shrinks just enough to let you know it. I bought this jacket in 2 colors- blue and tan- I love that they look nicer than a regular sweatshirt- it’s medium weight and the pockets are great- the zipper is sturdy and it holds up in the wash-

I loved the color & softness, but the fit was not right even when ordering an XL. My hips are large but it just wasn't fitting. I returned the item.
I bought a size larger for ease of dressing over flannel shirts or sweaters. The inside is soft enough to wear on its own. The zipper is good quality. No shrinkage after several washes.
